instructions.da: Drej let til venstre videre ad Cool highway
instructions.de: Leicht links weiter auf Cool highway
instructions.en: Make a slight left to stay on Cool highway
instructions.eo: Turniĝu ete maldekstren al Cool highway
instructions.es: Doble levemente a la izquierda en Cool highway
instructions.es-ES: Doble levemente a la izquierda en Cool highway
instructions.fr: S’aligner légèrement à gauche pour rester sur Cool highway
instructions.he: פנה קלות שמאלה כדי להישאר על Cool highway
instructions.id: Tetap agak di kiri ke Cool highway
instructions.it: Fai una leggera curva a sinistra per stare su Cool highway
instructions.pl: Skręć w lewo w łagodny zakręt, aby pozostać na Cool highway
instructions.pt-BR: Faça uma curva suave a esquerda para manter-se na Cool highway
instructions.pt-PT: Vire ligeiramente à esquerda para se manter em Cool highway
instructions.ro: Virați ușor stânga pe Cool highway
instructions.ru: Плавно поверните налево на Cool highway
instructions.sv: Sväng vänster och fortsätt på Cool highway
instructions.tr: Cool highway üzerinde kalmak için sola hafif dönüş yap
instructions.uk: Поверніть плавно ліворуч щоб залишитись на Cool highway
instructions.vi: Nghiêng về bên trái để chạy tiếp trên Cool highway
